Package de.fherfurt.clevercash.api.service

Klasse BankAccountService

java.lang.Object
de.fherfurt.clevercash.api.service.BankAccountService
@Service public class BankAccountService extends Object
Service class for managing bank accounts.
Autor:
Richard Prax, Jakob Roch, Anton Götz

  • Methodendetails

    • findAllBankAccounts

      public List<BankAccount> findAllBankAccounts(int userID) throws NoSuchElementException
      Finds all bank accounts associated with a user.
      Parameter:
      userID - the ID of the user
      Gibt zurück:
      list of bank accounts
      Löst aus:
      NoSuchElementException - if the user is not found

    • findBankAccountByID

      public BankAccount findBankAccountByID(int userID, int bankAccountID) throws NoSuchElementException
      Finds a specific bank account by ID for a user.
      Parameter:
      userID - the ID of the user
      bankAccountID - the ID of the bank account
      Gibt zurück:
      the bank account
      Löst aus:
      NoSuchElementException - if the user or bank account is not found

    • addBankAccountToUser

      public BankAccount addBankAccountToUser(int userID, NewBankAccountDTO newBankAccountDTO) throws NoSuchElementException, AlreadyExistsException, IllegalArgumentException
      Adds a new bank account to a user.
      Parameter:
      userID - the ID of the user
      newBankAccountDTO - the new bank account data
      Gibt zurück:
      the added bank account
      Löst aus:
      NoSuchElementException - if the user is not found
      AlreadyExistsException - if a bank account with the same name already exists
      IllegalArgumentException - if the bank account data is invalid

    • updateBankAccount

      public BankAccount updateBankAccount(int userID, int bankAccountID, NewBankAccountDTO newBankAccountDTO) throws NoSuchElementException, IllegalArgumentException, AlreadyExistsException
      Updates an existing bank account.
      Parameter:
      userID - the ID of the user
      bankAccountID - the ID of the bank account
      newBankAccountDTO - the updated bank account data
      Gibt zurück:
      the updated bank account
      Löst aus:
      NoSuchElementException - if the user or bank account is not found
      IllegalArgumentException - if the bank account data is invalid
      AlreadyExistsException - if another bank account with the same name already exists

    • createOrUpdateBankAccount

      public BankAccount createOrUpdateBankAccount(BankAccount bankAccount)
      Creates or updates a bank account in the repository.
      Parameter:
      bankAccount - the bank account to create or update
      Gibt zurück:
      the created or updated bank account

    • deleteUserBankAccount

      public void deleteUserBankAccount(int userID, int bankAccountID) throws NoSuchElementException
      Deletes a bank account from a user.
      Parameter:
      userID - the ID of the user
      bankAccountID - the ID of the bank account
      Löst aus:
      NoSuchElementException - if the user or bank account is not found

    • canMakeTransaction

      public boolean canMakeTransaction(BankAccount bankAccount, Transaction transaction)
      Checks if a transaction can be made from a bank account.
      Parameter:
      bankAccount - the bank account
      transaction - the transaction to check
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the transaction can be made, false otherwise
